conversations.body_text: Hello, this is your Haptics logistics link. The pedals have not yet been dispatched as our German warehouse is currently out of stock. To avoid incurring any duties, we will send them to you next week. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045911841497

Hello,

my Packard arrived today, but unfortunately the baseplate is missing. Is it
on the way?

Best regards

Sven

Sven Klaß <klasssven@googlemail.com> schrieb am Fr., 19. Sept. 2025, 10:44:

> Thanks for the update
>
> support@simsonn.com

Hi Sven Klaß,      We apologize, but our Pro X Ultra base plates from Germany are currently out of stock. The latest shipment did not include base plates. We will ship your order from China, and we will cover any customs duties incurred.

Thank you. Although it is a little bit annoying to have to wait before I
can install these great pedals, I am very greatful for you outstanding
customer service! I am happy to recommend you :). Will write again if I
have to pay any custom duties.

Best regards

Sven

support@simsonn.com
Hi Sven Klaß,     We apologize for the inconvenience. Here is your shipping tracking link: https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045938437771
